name: Build Yourself
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 45. The topic was "Start with nothing". I feel like a lot of people struggle with feelings of being worthless, not good enough etc. There's no better way to portray the feeling of "Starting with nothing" than that.

I wanted to create a game which shows that as long as you are alive, you can fix your life. It won't be easy, but it will be worth it.

If that little robot can do it, so can you.

Everything in the game was created by me. I used UE4 and Blender.
